lead_paragraph: Barcelona star Lionel Messi will meet an Afghan boy who gained Internet fame after a touching series of photographs went viral, showing him playing in a shirt improvised from a plastic bag and bearing the name and playing number of his hero.

headline.print_headline: Messi to Meet Young Afghan Famed for Shirt Made From Plastic Bag
headline.main: Messi to Meet Young Afghan Famed for Shirt Made From Plastic Bag

snippet: Barcelona star Lionel Messi will meet an Afghan boy who gained Internet fame after a touching series of photographs went viral, showing him playing in a shirt improvised from a plastic bag and bearing the name and playing number of his hero....
